info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued January 17 at 4:26AM CST until January 18 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 12. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Rapides, Avoyelles, Allen, Evangeline and St. Landry Parishes. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 10 AM CST this morning. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
